    • Highlights

    • The Velankanni with Pondicherry tour offers a peaceful journey through the cultural and spiritual landmarks of Tamil Nadu.
    • Visit the renowned Basilica of Our Lady of Good Health in Velankanni, a famous Christian pilgrimage site known for its healing miracles and architectural beauty.
    • Explore the French-inspired architecture and serene beaches of Pondicherry, including popular sites like the French Quarter and Promenade Beach.
    • Immerse yourself in the spiritual ambiance of the Aurobindo Ashram and the tranquil surroundings of Auroville, a universal town promoting human unity.
    • Enjoy the local cuisine, markets, and scenic spots, experiencing the blend of French and Tamil culture unique to Pondicherry.
    • This tour provides a mix of religious, historical, and scenic experiences along Tamil Nadu’s coastal regions.

    Velankanni with Pondicherry Tour - 2 Nights / 3 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Velankanni

    • Arrive in Velankanni and transfer to your hotel.
    • Visit the Basilica of Our Lady of Good Health, a renowned pilgrimage site.
    • Attend evening mass and explore the peaceful church surroundings.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Velankanni.

    Day 2: Velankanni to Pondicherry

    • After breakfast, drive to Pondicherry, enjoying scenic coastal views along the way.
    • Explore the French Quarter, Promenade Beach, and other historical sites.
    • Visit the Aurobindo Ashram and experience the peaceful ambiance.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Pondicherry.

    Day 3: Auroville Visit and Departure

    • After breakfast, visit Auroville, a universal town dedicated to human unity.
    • Explore the Matrimandir and surrounding gardens.
    • Return to Pondicherry for some final shopping or relaxation by the beach.
    • Transfer to the airport or railway station for onward journey.
    • End of the Velankanni with Pondicherry Tour.
